TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Recipe Time Adjustments
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Allows work times for recipes to be multiplied for faster or slower crafting times.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Adobe Brick Forming Time
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Multiplies the time required to form clay at the workbench, the crafting spot does whatever that speed is at a slower rate so it'll affect both. Higher number takes longer.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Clay Digging Time
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Multiplies the time required to dig for clay at the workbench, the crafting spot does whatever that speed is at a slower rate so it'll affect both. Higher number takes longer.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Electrified Kalocite
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, kalocite grown over power conduits will provide a small electric charge. This was originally going to be a native feature but felt a little OP so now it's a tweak.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Cloth Components
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes the need for cloth from medieval components, instead adding more wood to the cost to balance it out.
